basic_information.scholarship_name: MidFirst Bank UCO Alumni Legacy Endowed Scholarship

description: To provide scholarships for UCO students whose parent, grandparent, or parental guardian attended UCO. Eligibility Requirements Must complete the Incoming Student Qualifying Application Must be an entering freshman or transfer student Minimum 2.5 GPA Complete a 250-word essay on what it means to you to be able to attend the same university as your legacy parent, grandparent, or legal guardian Must be enrolled full-time Scholarship awards are limited to a certain number of students each year. Not all that apply will be awarded. This scholarship is available to apply for during the Incoming Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "Incoming UCO Student Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "Incoming UCO Student Qualifying Scholarship Application"
